thread.title: Thor: Ragnarok is to start filming in Queensland in June 2016 - Movies
thread.title_full: Thor: Ragnarok is to start filming in Queensland in June 2016 - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Rachel Babbage
title: Thor: Ragnarok is to start filming in Queensland in June 2016 - Movies
text: Chris Hemsworth can look forward to spending some time filming on home turf when Thor: Ragnarok starts production in Australia.That news was announced yesterday but we've now got a start date for when cameras will begin rolling - June 2016. Chris Hemsworth in Thor Pre-production will start in Queensland in January, with location shooting taking place around the city and at Village Roadshow Studios on the Gold Coast.Louis D'Esposito, co-president of Marvel Studios, said: "Queensland offers an amazing and diverse backdrop for Thor: Ragnarok and we are very excited to bring this film to such an incredible locale. Marvel Studios would like to thank the Queensland Government for helping to make this a reality." Loki and Thor in 'Thor: The Dark World' Thor: Ragnarok will be the final part in the Thor trilogy, picking up from Loki (Tom Hiddleston) taking on his adopted father Odin's (Anthony Hopkins) persona and claiming the throne.Christopher Yost and Craig Kyle have co-written the script which will see the Hulk/Bruce Banner (Mark Ruffalo) joining forces with Thor.Thor: Ragnarok will be released on November 3, 2017.Watch Tom Hiddleston discuss why Loki was left out of Avengers: Age of Ultron: function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4533149272001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14533149272001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4533149272001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4533149272001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14533149272001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4533149272001.init(); ai_type="video"; }
